asgn2Tests

Class TrainTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • asgn2Tests.TrainTests

  • public class TrainTests
extends java.lang.Object
    Test for DepartingTrain class. This test will track the configuration and passenger boarding status of whole train
    Version:
    May 2013
    Author:
    Yudo Dwi Hanggodo Patriabekti

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void testAddingFreightWhilePassengersOnBoard()
      Create test for adding Freight car while passenger on board Start with adding locomotive valid input, passengerCar valid input followed by passenger on board continue with adding freight car valid input Expecting TrainException
      void testAddLocomotive()
      Create test for adding locomotive through the departing train Start with gross weight and classification input
      void testCallNextCarriageTwice()
      Create test for the next carriage Start with adding locomotive valid input continue with another carriage valid input
      void testCallNextCarriageUntilReturnNull()
      Create test for the next carriage Start with adding locomotive valid input continue with another carriage valid input until return null Make sure that the next carriage return null if call above the bound
      void testCreateTrain() 
      void testDissalowedConfiguration()
      Create test to disallowed configuration Start with valid input of locomotive, freight car and passenger car Expecting TrainException class
      void testFirstCarriage()
      Create test for first carriage on departing train start with valid input of gross weight and classification
      void testFirstCarriageAfterNextCarriages()
      Create test for the next carriage Start with adding locomotive valid input continue with two carriages valid input Call locomotive with firstCarriage() method.
      void testFirstCarriageBeforeAddingCarriage()
      Create test train exception on board.
      void testFirstTrainNotLocomotive()
      Create test first train behind locomotive car Start with adding freight car valid input expecting TrainException class
      void testGetNumberOfSeats()
      Create test to get number of seat in passenger car Start with adding locomotive valid input continue with adding first and second passenger car valid input
      void testGetNumberOnBoard()
      Create test to get number passenger on departing train Start with adding locomotive valid input continue with adding another carriage valid input with specific number of passenger valid input
      void testLocomotiveMoreThanOne()
      Create test for locomotive more than one on the same departing train Start with adding first locomotive valid input, continue with the second locomotive valid input.
      void testNegativeNewPassengers()
      Create test for negative new passenger Start with adding locomotive and passenger cars valid input continue with adding negative input to passenger car Expecting TrainException class
      void testNextCarriageAfterFirstCarriage()
      Create test for the next carriage Start with adding locomotive valid input continue with another carriage valid input
      void testNextCarriageWithoutFirstCarriages()
      Create test for the next carriage Start with adding locomotive valid input Call locomotive with nextCarriage() method.
      void testPassengerBoard()
      Create test for passenger board on departing train Start with adding locomotive valid input continue with adding carriage valid input followed by passenger valid input
      void testRemoveCarriage()
      Create test to remove carriage Start with valid input of gross weight and classification Continue with adding another carriage with specific classification
      void testToString()
      Create test to testToString departing train Started with adding locomotive valid input, continue with passenger and freight car valid input.
      void testTrainCanMove()
      Create test does the train can move the departing train or not Start with valid input of gross weight and classification

      • testFirstCarriageAfterNextCarriages

        public void testFirstCarriageAfterNextCarriages()
                                         throws TrainException
        Create test for the next carriage Start with adding locomotive valid input continue with two carriages valid input Call locomotive with firstCarriage() method. Continue with call nextCarriage() twice. Call firstCarriage() again. Expected firstCarriage in the first call is the same same object with firstCarriage in the last call.
        Throws:
        TrainException

        TrainException
